column4: I just installed an Ubuntu, I use a netwrok connection trough UPC Cable ( without authentication, it authenticates me by my MAC address ) I just can't set it up. Help me please
do you get an ip via dhcp from the modem?
I am stupid for this cable connection. In windows, it's plug and play :) But in linux, it sais, network is unreacable. I thin DHCP, cause i don't have to enter ani ip/dns/anything
